# polytomic_synapse_connection (Resource)

Synapse Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "polytomic_synapse_connection" "synapse" {
  name = "example"
  configuration = {
    hostname = "host.example.com"
    username = "user"
    password = "password"
    database = "database"
    port     = 5439
  }
}
```
